metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7577 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
activerecord/lib/active_record/nested_attributes.rb in Active Record inRuby on Rails 3.1.x and 3.2.x before 3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before 4.2.5.1, and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 does notproperly implement a certain destroy option, which allows remote attackersto bypass intended change restrictions by leveraging use of the nestedattributes feature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.6-1').
